title.rendered: ANVIZ M3 PRO OUTDOOR FINGERPRINT & RFID ACCESS CONTROL

content.rendered:
M3 Pro is a metal casing, IP65 water-proof design compact access control device, suitable for outdoor applications.It supports 13.56MHZ mifare card and 125KHZ EM card dual frequency module. The touch backlit keypad supports TCP/IP and RS485 communication convenient for customers to use. The M3 Pro has both built-in relay for direct lock and standard wiegand output, which can work as a standalone access controller and RFID reader.

Features

  • User – 10,000
  • Card Capacity – 10,000
  • Record Capacity – 200,000
  • I/O Supported – TCP/IP, RS485, Mini USB, Wiegand Out
  • Relay – Relay output
  • Identification Mode – Password, RFID Card, Bluetooth (optional)
  • RFID Card Type – Dual Frequency for EM and Mifare
  • Keypad – Touch Keypad
  • Operating Voltage – 12V DC
